podcasts.title: Creative Pep Talk
podcasts.description: Andy J Miller is an extremely encouraging host.

podcasts.title: Shop Talk
podcasts.description: Chris Coyier and Dave Rupert host a show on front-end web development.

podcasts.title: Australian Design Radio
podcasts.description: Try Episode 02, 32, 33

podcasts.title: Ask A Freelancer
podcasts.description: A short-format podcast where Andy [J Miller] answers three submitted questions.

podcasts.title: Spontaneanation
podcasts.description: Improv show hosted by Paul F Tompkins. Try Episodes 137, 156, 159

podcasts.title: Comedy Bang! Bang!
podcasts.description: Scott Aukerman interviews comedians and other strange characters.

podcasts.title: Threedom
podcasts.description: Paul F Tompkins, Lauren Lapkus, and Scott Aukerman hang out.

podcasts.title: Stay F Homekins
podcasts.description: Paul F Tompkins and Janie Haddad Tompkins stay home during a global pandemic

podcasts.title: The Big Ones
podcasts.description: Amanda Lund and Maria Blasucci – the best co-hosting duo in podcasts – tackle the big questions of life.

podcasts.title: Superego
podcasts.description: Improvised sketches by Drs Matt Gourley, Jeremy Carter, and Paul F Tompkins.

podcasts.title: Reply All
podcasts.description: Stories about the internet, hosted by PJ Vogt and Alex Goldman. “It features stories about how people shape the internet, and the internet shapes people.” Try Episode 56.

podcasts.title: Front Burner
podcasts.description: A deep dive on a current news story from the CBC.

podcasts.title: CBC News: World Report
podcasts.description: Daily 10-min news show from the CBC.

podcasts.title: Commons
podcasts.description: The political side of *Canadaland*.

podcasts.title: The Imposter
podcasts.description: Canadian art show from *Canadaland*.

podcasts.title: Song Exploder
podcasts.description: Musicians take apart their songs, and piece by piece, tell the story of how they were made.

podcasts.title: Cinema of Meaning
podcasts.author: Thomas Flight and Tom van der Linden

podcasts.title: The Insert Credit Show
podcasts.description: Several games industry professionals, including Tim Rogers, talk about video games. Loose enough to be fun, structured enough to keep momentum.

podcasts.title: James Bonding
podcasts.description: Matt Mira and Matt Gourley revisit every James Bond film with their comedy friends.

podcasts.title: Good Christian Fun
podcasts.description: Kevin and Caroline poke fun at Christian pop culture.

podcasts.title: Dissect
podcasts.description: Dissect is a serialized music podcast. Season 1 looks at Kendrick Lamar’s To Pimp a Butterfly.

podcasts.title: Panic Podcast
podcasts.description: The sidequests, subplots, and accidents of history that round out the software development and game publisher, Panic. The stories behind Untitled Goose Game, Pantscast, and more.

podcasts.title: Code Switch
podcasts.description: “A team of journalists fascinated by the overlapping themes of race, ethnicity and culture, how they play out in our lives and communities, and how all of this is shifting.”

podcasts.title: The Sporkful
podcasts.description: The Sporkful isn’t for foodies, it’s for eaters.

podcasts.title: Switched On Pop
podcasts.description: A songwriter and a musicologist break down how popular music works.

podcasts.title: Whatevertown
podcasts.description: Okay, this one is mine.
